AddChoice.description:
DPROPERTY_COMBO [Client] Add a choice to your combo control.

[string] Text
  Shown text.

[any] data
  Stored Data.

[boolean] select=false
  Select this element?

DataChanged.description:
DPROPERTY_COMBO [Client] Called after the user selects a new value.

[any] data
  The new data that was selected.

SetSelected.description:
DPROPERTY_COMBO [Client] Set the selected option.

[number] Id
  Id of the choice to be selected.

Setup.description:
DPROPERTY_COMBO [Client] Sets up a combo control.

[string] prop="Combo"
  The name of DProperty sub control to add.

[table] data={text="Select..."}
  Data to use to set up the combo box control.
Structure:

 string text - The default label for this combo box
 table values - The values to add to the combo box
